scripts.build: astro check && astro build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/index.html';let c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');c=c.replace(/=\"\/_astro\//g,'=\"./_astro/');c=c.replace(/=\"\/assets\//g,'=\"./assets/');fs.writeFileSync(f,c);"
scripts.build:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production astro build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/index.html';let c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');c=c.replace(/=\"\/_astro\//g,'=\"./_astro/');c=c.replace(/=\"\/assets\//g,'=\"./assets/');fs.writeFileSync(f,c);"
scripts.preview: pnpm run build:preview && cross-env ASTRO_PREVIEW=true astro preview
